articles.title: Winning Powerball numbers announced for estimated $1.25 billion jackpot - CBS News
articles.description: Wednesday's jackpot has an estimated cash value of $572.1 million, Powerball said.

articles.title: BP Makes O’Neill First Female Big Oil CEO in Bid for Revival - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: BP Plc appointed Meg O’Neill as its new chief executive officer, replacing Murray Auchincloss after just two years in the job as it struggles to revive its fortunes following a botched pivot toward renewable energy.

articles.title: Should more be done to tackle 'ghost jobs'? - BBC
articles.description: Companies are advertising vacancies that have already been filled or might not have ever existed.

articles.title: Bank of England expected to cut interest rates - BBC
articles.description: Analysts believe the Bank rate will fall from 4% to 3.75%, lowering the cost of borrowing.

articles.title: November's inflation report is the first to be released after the shutdown. Here's what to expect - CNBC
articles.description: November's CPI report is expected to show the annual inflation rate at 3.1%, according to economists polled by Dow Jones.

articles.title: Instacart shares plunge 11% on report that FTC is probing company over AI pricing tool - CNBC
articles.description: The FTC sent a civil investigative demand to Instacart, Reuters reported, citing unnamed people.

articles.title: Salad dressings recalled in 27 U.S. states because they could contain "foreign objects" - CBS News
articles.description: Onions used to make the salad dressings could contain "black plastic planting material," according to food regulators.

articles.title: Taco Bell Is Bringing Back A Popular Menu Item & Fans Say It's 'A Miracle' - Delish
articles.description: Taco Bell is bringing back the cult-favorite Quesarito nationwide starting December 18, following years of nonstop fan demand.

articles.title: Santoli's Wednesday market wrap-up: Ability to absorb unwind of AI-infrastructure trade being tested - CNBC
articles.description: Efforts to rotate away from danger by moving to banks, value stocks and consumer cyclicals are hitting some near-term limits.

articles.title: Delta President Glen Hauenstein to retire after storied career - Delta News Hub

articles.description: Strategy includes 40 recommendations that will continue the United States’ position as an aviation powerhouse for the next 100 years

articles.title: iRobot CEO says previous management was ‘in denial’ over group’s troubles - Financial Times
articles.description: Gary Cohen defends takeover of US robotic vacuum company by Chinese rival following bankruptcy

articles.title: Oracle Stock Falls After Report Raises Concerns About Data Center Funding - Investor's Business Daily
articles.description: Oracle stock fell after a key financing partner Blue Owl Capital reportedly backed out of a $10-billion data center project.

articles.title: FDA announces recall of nondairy ice cream because it may contain "small stones" - CBS News
articles.description: The recall affects So Delicious Dairy Free's Salted Caramel Cluster ice cream with best by dates of Aug. 8, 2027.

articles.description: The new website  signals how White House officials envision the government, corporations and billionaires contributing to the accounts.

articles.title: How will the stock market perform in 2026? Wall Street pros weigh in. - CBS News
articles.description: Wall Street analysts expect another strong year in stocks in 2026, propelled by continued AI sector gains and additional Fed interest-rate cuts.
